name: Patient Zero (diforus)
description:
Game was created at Siberian Game Jam 2020

theme: "...rules the world"

https://vk.com/sibgamejam

by Kirill Buyanin

You are patient zero. You are host of unknown virus. You infect people if you stay too close to them. Keep social distance and follow to-do list to finish the game. 

The goal is to come back to your hotel and infect nobody!

Controls:

  • WASD - move your character
  • Spacebar - jump
